sources.title: The Fighting Marines (1935) 12-CHAPTER CLIFFHANGERüçïGRANT WITHERS
sources.description:
12-CHAPTER SERIAL MARATHON!
Starring: Grant Withers, Robert Warwick, Ann Rutherford, Jason Robards Sr.
Directors: B. Reeves Eason, Joseph Kane
A mysterious figure known as The Tiger Shark begins a program of sabotage and murder when the US Marines unwittingly endanger his secret Pacific Island hideout!
  üçïCHAPTERSüçï
0:00       PizzaFLIX Intro
01:07     CHAPTER 1:  Human Targets
28:38     CHAPTER 2:  Isle of Missing Men
47:16     CHAPTER 3:  The Savage Horde
1:03:43  CHAPTER 4:  The Mark of the Tiger Shark
1:21:52  CHAPTER 5:  The Gauntlet of Grief
1:37:38  CHAPTER 6:  Robbers Roost
1:54:09  CHAPTER 7:  Jungle Terrors
2:10:27  CHAPTER 8:  Siege of Halfway Island
2:26:10  CHAPTER 9:  Death from the Sky
2:43:21  CHAPTER 10: Wheels of Destruction
3:00:11  CHAPTER 11: Behind the Mask
3:16:16 CHAPTER 12: Two Against the Horde
3:31:00  Please Subscribe!

metadata.Plot: Corporal Larry Grant and Sergeant "Mac" McGowan, of the United States Marine Corps, are rival for the love of Frances Schiller, but team up to hunt down "The Tiger Shark," a mad, scientific wizard who is holding Sergeant William Schiller, Frances' brother, a prisoner on a wild, jungle island in the Pacific.
metadata.Writer: Wallace MacDonald, Maurice Geraghty, Ray Trampe
metadata.Actors: Grant Withers, Adrian Morris, Ann Rutherford
